article:
This library support:
px, pt, cm, mm, on, and % units. See also
filters. See also
clip paths
linear gradients
radial gradients
the style element
rect, circle, ellipse, path, polygon, polyline, line, image, text, tspan elements
fill, stroke, style, class, transform attributes
Notz that the support is mainly for SVG 1.1, but some SVG 1.2 constructs are also supported.
Radial gradients which use absolute values for their definitions do not work correctly for the moment
Some filters are not handled
